summary: This mod adds to a camp in vanilla Skyrim, located along the path going west from Helgen.
descriptionHtml:
Before you download please note this is my first ever Skyrim mod, so please don\'t be too harsh, k? 

IMPORTANT: If you want this mod, hit the track button, I will (hopefully) be CONSTANTLY updating this mod.

The wood chopping block works with only one of my characters, so if it doesn\'t work when you use it, I suggest you download \"Alternate Start- Live Another Life\", because it adds a small camp very close to the camp in this mod with a fully functioning wood-chopping block.

This mod adds to a camp in vanilla Skyrim, located along the path going west from Helgen. I have not added much so far, but I plan to eventually add an underground shelter area with a blacksmithing forge, enchanting table, and some safe storage.

This should be helpful to Frostfall users, since I have added a wood-chopping block, some extra firewood, and a cooking spit (for making soups, which temporarily increases exposure resistance), and there are added snowberries and thistle in the area, which can be made into a resist frost potion.

Also available on Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=144180886

How to install manually:
Download zip and extract all contents to the data folder.

How to update:
Download latest version and extract contents to the data folder. Choose to overwrite.

If you are a modder and would like to help with this mod, please message me.
author: KohakuFox

files.name: DotFox Camp
files.changelogHtml: New items added, chest is now safe storage, wood chopping block added, cooking spit added, lantern added to the road in front of the camp to make it easier to find, more dead animals on the hanging racks, clipping issues fixed, unique horse added.

files.name: DotFox Camp
files.changelogHtml:
Wood-chopping block fixed, path added, three wolves added to a nearby shack which a path leads to, map marker added, alchemy set added, more loot added, trapdoor moved to shack.
EDIT 4: Added basement area, renamed to Habasi's Camp, added more objects, added some food on a table, added a crafting anvil. Basement area has a smelter and an oven, as well as some food/ ingredients and a barrel full of skooma. My dovahkiin is a druggie and now yours can too.
